content.raw:
This test is broken in `windws7-amd64` build.

```
Error Message
D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\SystemPaths_TEST.cc:136
Expected equality of these values:
  file1
    Which is: "test_dir1\\test_f1"
  paths.FindFile("test_f1")
    Which is: "test_dir1/\\test_f1"
test_dir1/\test_f1
Stacktrace
D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-common\src\SystemPaths_TEST.cc:136
Expected equality of these values:
  file1
    Which is: "test_dir1\\test_f1"
  paths.FindFile("test_f1")
    Which is: "test_dir1/\\test_f1"
test_dir1/\test_f1
```
